title: HET/HPF observations of Helium in warm, hot, and ultra-hot Jupiters
summary: This paper presents high-resolution transmission spectroscopy results for the helium triplet line of sixteen gas giants, part of an extensive helium survey conducted to study atmospheric escape processes of close-in exoplanets.
usefulness_reason: Score 60 assigned because the summary explicitly mentions "extensive helium survey conducted", which directly relates to "Survey data".
